headline: Capri Shows Signs of Stabilization With Smaller Q1 Sales Decline
summary: Sales still declined, but less so than in the fourth quarter and the pending sale of Versace will give it a $1.4 billion cash infusion.

raw.headline: Capri Shows Signs of Stabilization With Smaller Q1 Sales Decline
raw.summary: Sales still declined, but less so than in the fourth quarter and the pending sale of Versace will give it a $1.4 billion cash infusion.

headline: Miu Miu overtakes Loewe to become world’s top fashion brand
summary: Burberry reappeared in the top 20 rankings and The Row’s Dune sandal was the top product in the second quarter Lyst Index of 2025.

raw.headline: Miu Miu overtakes Loewe to become world’s top fashion brand
raw.summary: Burberry reappeared in the top 20 rankings and The Row’s Dune sandal was the top product in the second quarter Lyst Index of 2025.
